status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7h20d","text":"Staining of 35μm free-floating mouse brain sections is performed in glass staining dishes (Pyrex 36754-60) using 8-section staining nets (Ted Pella 36154-64). dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.5jyl8pzk9g2w/v1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":159,"length":48}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B48D9FD7608C453DBB8B3D409D424649","url":"http://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.5jyl8pzk9g2w/v1"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"51ghh","text":"The sections can be transferred between wells using a paint brush. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
